priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Disease Presentation Type Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C127268

self.title: CDISC SDTM Disease Presentation Type Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the symptoms and/or clinical manifestation of a disease.
name: Disease Presentation Type
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Disease Presentation Type Terminology

terms.definition: A lesion that demonstrates both cystic and solid components; the solid components can range from thin walls (septae) to a solid tissue mass.
Abnormal collection of fluid in a body cavity.
Abnormal collection of fluid in the peritoneal cavity.
A malignant neoplasm that has spread from its original site to the arachnoid mater and the pia mater, the two innermost layers of tissue that cover the brain and spinal cord.
